```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
url <- read_html("https://www.eliteprospects.com/league/pwhl-w/stats/2023-2024")
tab <- html_table(html_node(url, xpath = ))

tab <- tab %>% filter(Player != "")
```

```{r}
test <- tab %>% html_table()

head( test[[1]] )
head( test[[2]] )
head( test[[3]] )
```
